Line5.789BF: I know the weight of your reasons, but Lilith remains your concern. Mine lies elsewhere.
VoiceDir5.789BF: Sincere, understanding, but adamant. She feels for Donan, but her troubles aren't over.
Line7.7FA05: Leaving? We go to face Lilith. I had hoped you would join us.
Line1.789BF: Ahh, I hear laughter on the wind. Elias' head hangs from the Tree of Whispers. And your soulstone is attuned. This is where I leave you.
Line25.7FA05: This is farewell, then. And thank you...for the tea.
Line17.BAE4: I've not seen him since...since Elias spent his last words calling him a coward.
Line29.6DE47: But his head is on the Tree of Whispers...so the Tree knows where Lilith is going.
Line27.BAE4: Elias never told us where to find her.
Line37.7FA05: Brother, no. Get to the Tree, now! Stop him!
Line31.6DE47: Lorath could ask, but he'll have to pay the price.
Line15.7FA05: She called me by my name. Lorath won't believe--where is he?
Line19.7FA05: And to prove his courage, he what? Rode to face Lilith alone?
VoiceDir37.7FA05: Deep grief and alarm. Barking orders, desperate.
Line35.6DE47: The same Elias paid. Eternity on the Tree.
